name: Coty Inc.
description: Coty Inc. is a global leader in beauty and personal care products, specializing in cosmetics, skincare, fragrances, and hair color. Founded in 1904 by François Coty in Paris, the company has a long-standing heritage in the beauty industry and is known for its innovative approach to fragrance and personal care. Coty operates through several key segments, including Luxury, Professional, and Consumer Beauty, offering a wide range of products that appeal to diverse consumer preferences. The company boasts an extensive portfolio of iconic brands such as CoverGirl, Clairol, Wella, and Calvin Klein fragrances. As a pioneer in the beauty sector, Coty emphasizes sustainability and responsible sourcing in its product development, aiming to reduce its environmental footprint. The company is committed to inclusivity and diversity, ensuring that its product offerings cater to a broad spectrum of consumers. Coty has embraced digital transformation to enhance its e-commerce capabilities and engage with consumers through innovative marketing strategies. With a mission to celebrate beauty in all its forms, Coty continues to adapt to market trends and consumer demands, positioning itself as a formidable player in the competitive beauty landscape.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA
